intro: I build AI systems that power real business decisions. Here's the path that got me here.

timeline.title: 33Floors — Team Lead
timeline.description: Five years leading a small engineering team, shipping customer-facing enterprise software end-to-end. React, Next.js, TypeScript, .NET. Built ETL pipelines processing hundreds of gigabytes in under 30 minutes. Learned to work with ambiguity and translate business needs into real features.

timeline.title: Full-Time Vanlife
timeline.description: Two years on the road, working remotely across the West. Flagstaff, Santa Barbara, and Estes Park became my regular haunts.

timeline.title: AI Endurance — Co-Founder
timeline.description: Co-founded and rebuilt an endurance training platform from the ground up. Modernized legacy systems with React/Next.js, shipped PWAs scoring 100/100 Lighthouse, and delivered a 2× increase in signups and conversions.

timeline.title: PathQuest — Founding Developer
timeline.description: Built a full-stack web and mobile app in 6 weeks—backend APIs, React/Next.js frontend, React Native mobile, with Mapbox visualizations. Geospatial pipelines transforming Strava + OSM data into insights.

timeline.title: Santa Barbara, CA
timeline.description: Current home base. Building enterprise AI systems while enjoying ocean trails and mountain runs.

timeline.title: Standard Communities — AI Engineer
timeline.description: Building AI-powered workflows and data tools for affordable housing. Custom agents and MCP servers that unify data from HUD and other sources, enhance it with LLMs and geocoding, confidence-score across subjective data, and power multi-million dollar deal-making decisions.
